desc: At Adriatika Hotel & Residence, every week is filled with flavors, special moments, and experiences designed to enrich your stay.
desc2: Enjoy a varied culinary offering at our Markis Restaurant: from the Markis Lunch Monday through Friday, featuring fresh and creative options for your business lunches, to our elegant Thursday Afternoon Teas, ideal for sharing a sophisticated break. And to close out the week, we invite you to experience our traditional Sunday Brunch, a complete and delicious culinary experience to enjoy with family or friends.
desc3: Each of these activities has been designed to offer memorable experiences and a welcoming atmosphere for both guests and local visitors.
title: Activities
